name: default
label: Blank Scrolling Page
description: A blank template for creating a scrolling web page.

name: default2
label: Blank Full Screen App
description: A blank template for creating a web app that uses the full area of the page.

name: city-explorer
label: City Explorer
description: Striking headlines highlight your maps, images, and content in a linear scroll design.

name: map-viewer
label: Map Viewer
description: A map centric app that utilizes sections to interact with your features on the map which uses the full area of the page.

name: public-info
label: Public Information
description: An attention-grabbing layout with bold buttons that easily navigate to your maps and content.
